member.name: T:Sander.KeyVaultCache.KeyVaultCache
member.summary: Key vault cache. Use this class as singleton/static per KeyVault instance

member.name: M:Sander.KeyVaultCache.KeyVaultCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.KeyVaultClient,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary:
Create a new instance of KeyVaultCache, optionally defining expiration duration for caching
Omitting the duration or using in the default TimeSpan instance marks infinite duration (no expiration)
member.param: Optional caching duration. Omit the parameter for infinite caching (no expiration)

member.name: M:Sander.KeyVaultCache.KeyVaultCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.KeyVaultClient,System.UInt32)
member.summary:
Create a new instance of KeyVaultCache, optionally defining expiration duration for caching
Omitting the cachingDurationSeconds or using in 0 results infinite duration (no expiration)
member.param: Optional caching duration in seconds. Omit the parameter or use 0 for infinite caching (no expiration)
